question: Which of these best describes your current role?

What programming / scripting languages are you proficient in? (select all that apply with your experience level)
- None: I have never used this language
- Beginner: I can write a correct implementation for a simple function
- Intermediate: I can design and implement whole programs
- Advanced: I can design and implement a complex system architecture

Which AI tools do you use specifically for coding? (select all that apply with your frequency of use)
- None: I have never used this tool
- Rarely: I use this tool a few times a month
- Sometimes: I use this tool a few times a week
- Very Often: I use this tool almost daily

How many years of experience do you have with programming in any language? This includes high school/university coursework, scripting, hobby projects, internships, or professional work. Make your best guess!

How many years of experience do you have building websites or web applications? This includes front-end, back-end, and full-stack development, or using website editors like Wix or Squarespace. Make your best guess!

How many months of experience do you have using generative AI assistants? This does NOT include auto-completion, linters or tab; only systems where you input a request/query and the AI assistant generates code that you can add to your codebase. Make your best guess!
